ModMetaData.name: XenoPreview
ModMetaData.author: coolnether123
ModMetaData.description: XenoPreview adds a dynamic live preview window to the xenotype creation screen. Instantly see how your custom xenotypes will appear as you select genes. Features include individual gender locks for separate rerolls and rotation, and toggles for apparel and tattoos (Ideology DLC required for tattoos). Supports RimWorld 1.4, 1.5, and 1.6. Safe to add or remove from saves at any time. Original idea suggested on the RimWorld Discord: https://discord.com/channels/214523379766525963/1372022155193225226
